name: Sweet Tamarind Chutney
description: Sweet and sour, this tamarind sauce is a flavorful Indian staple that's easy to prepare at home.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon black salt or Kosher salt

recipeInstructions.text: Heat water over medium-high heat until just boiling. Add in tamarind concentrate and stir until completely incorporated. Add jaggery, salt, cayenne, cumin, and ginger. Stir until sugar and salt are completely dissolved.

Reduce heat to a simmer and cook until thickened to a point that it's slightly syrupy, about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Let cool for 10 minutes. Use immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to 1 month.
